description: Details required for Condition 11 (Biodiversity Enhancement) of planning permission 21/01585/FUL (Erection of new 3 storey building with basement containing 7no. self-contained residential units with ancillary cycle store and refuse/recycling store (following demolition of existing dwellinghouse))
decision_conditions: The applicant has not submitted sufficient evidence to demonstrate meeting the requirements of Condition 11, the biodiversity enhancement plan provided has no details on the species selection for the proposed hedgerow. Native species should be used to best support local wildlife populations, especially considering the proximity to the SINC/ LNR.

application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
